definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])

sentences.english: My system is whatever's inside the box.
This article verifies the basic concept of counter-intelligence activities.
sentences.chinese: 本文明確了當代反情報活動的基本概念。

sentences.english: This basic concept is illustrated in most texts on hyd aulics.
sentences.chinese: 這個基本概念在大多數水力學教科書中已有介紹。

sentences.english: It is showing no difference for basic concept of school mental - health education.
sentences.chinese: 中小學心理健康教育的基本概念衆說紛紜，莫衷一是。

sentences.english: A discussion is made on the basic concept of rock weathering, and some fuzzy cognition is clarified.
sentences.chinese: 討論巖體風化的基本概念，澄清一些傳統的模糊認識。

sentences.english: Third, the basic concept and measuring methods of accounting of sustainable development.
sentences.chinese: 第三，可持續發展覈算的基本概念和測度方法問題。

sentences.english: A new grid security risk management method, benchmarking-based risk diagnosis analysis model, was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了若干種系統風險診斷分析方法的基本概念。

sentences.english: Let's start with the basic idea.
We will study the basic conceptual and computational tools of quantum field theory.
sentences.chinese: 我們將研究量子場論的基本概念和計算工具。

sentences.english: In Chapter 1, the basic concepts of VLBI were briefly described.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，介紹了甚長基線的基本概念。

sentences.english: Traffic is an important and basic concept in traffic theory.
sentences.chinese: 話務量是話務理論中的一個重要基本概念。

sentences.english: This course is a comprehensive analysis of the major concepts and principles applicable to insurance.
sentences.chinese: 本課程爲保險學基本概念與原則的一個綜合分析。

sentences.english: The main idea and basic concepts of polychromatic sets are first introduced.
sentences.chinese: 首先介紹了多色集合的主要思想和基本概念。

sentences.english: Basic concepts resemble other frameworks that separate the presentation layer from the code.
sentences.chinese: 其基本概念與把表示層和代碼分隔開的其他框架相似。

sentences.english: The paper expatiates on the concept of our national competitive sports system.
sentences.chinese: 主要通過對競技體育舉國體制基本概念的梳理。

sentences.english: Integral upper limit function is a basic concept in function differential calculus.
sentences.chinese: 積分上限函數是一元函數微分學的基本概念。
